TopicTitle: where will you go in the Debdeb system 1st?

Articles.Content: I don't know, depends on many factors that are still unknown.
Trivial as the gains my be with interstellar drives I still plan to do a Glumo gravity capture that directs to Gurdamma.

35 minutes ago, Pthigrivi said:

Trivial as the gains my be with interstellar drives I still plan to do a Glumo gravity capture that directs to Gurdamma. 

Gurdamma and Glumo are also the top on my list. Probably Gurdamma first.

Spoiler

When I first saw it in Feature Episode 4, I was immediately like "that's my first destination." A planet with a solid surface, rings, and oceans! I have so many ideas for a colony right next to a big water-filled crater, and Metallic Hydrogen-powered VTOL shuttles to transport crew...

Merbel also looks pretty cool. It probably won't be as close to Glumo as in the KSP2 Announcement Trailer showed, but I still think the view will be amazing.

My first body will probably be merbel as i think itll be the only body with breathable air. Once i gey fuel set up the next target will be Charr, I have a feeling we wont be able to stay on the surface for long, but Id definitely like to touch down at least
Gurdamma, 100%. The views from the surface of Donk have to be insane.
